knowledge.question: In the above C code snippet, what is happening on the last line?
choices: grade2 is created as an alias to grade1
grade2 is a pointer pointing to grade1
the contents of grade1 is being used to create and initialize grade2
grade2 is replacing grade1 in stack memory
explanation: Similar to any assignment, the contents of the right side variable is used as a copy to populate the contents of the left side variable.
